content: This is an emergency distress call broadcasting from the planet Gaia. If you're receiving this, please respond immediately. Hey, can I sniff you? Uh, that's definitely not possible or appropriate. This is a distress call, not whatever that was. I'm Stella. Who am I talking to? Yeah, sorry about that. Can I sniff you later? Seriously, that's not okay. Can we please stick to the basics here? I need to know who I'm actually talking to. So, what's your name? And how did you manage to pick up my distress signal? You're right. I didn't introduce myself. My name is Mustache. I accidentally stumbled upon this signal. Do you think this device can transmit smells? You know, for sniffing mustache, seriously, cut it out with the sniffing comments. That's not how this works.
title: AI NPCs will change games
author: MustacheAI

key_facts: FACT: A distress call is being broadcast from the planet Gaia.
FACT: The caller, Stella, is attempting to communicate with an unknown recipient.
FACT: The signal was accidentally picked up by a person named Mustache.
FACT: Mustache claims he stumbled upon the distress signal unintentionally.
FACT: Stella expresses concern about inappropriate comments regarding sniffing.
FACT: The conversation is taking place via an interstellar communication device.
FACT: The device may have capabilities beyond standard audio transmission.
FACT: Stella requests basic identification from the recipient before proceeding.
key_opinions: OPINION: The distress signal should be treated with seriousness, not humor.
OPINION: Sniffing-related jokes are inappropriate during an emergency situation.
OPINION: Mustacheâ€™s accidental discovery of the signal raises concerns about privacy.
OPINION: The communication device might have unintended sensory functions.
OPINION: Emotional tone and intent matter more than technical capability in emergencies.
key_datapoints: DATA: The distress signal originates from the planet Gaia.
DATA: The signal was received by an individual named Mustache.
DATA: The communication method involves voice transmission across interstellar distances.
DATA: The device may have sensory transmission features (e.g., smell transmission).
